DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy Safety Study Omacor® Taiwanese Hypertriglyceridemic Patients

DOC.criteria: Patient fast serum TG ≥ 200 mg/dL 1000 mg/dL Patients history pancreatitis consider risk develop pancreatitis Patient history severe cardiovascular event revascularization procedure within 6 month prior randomization
